title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Fostering Higher-Order Thinking Skills in Mathematics Through 21st-Century Collaborative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze two given business/HR case problems (e.g., organizational conflict resolution, workforce optimization) in a 3-person team project, apply SWOT analysis and 5Why techniques to create an evaluation report, and submit an action plan including two creative solution strategies.
Collaborate with peers on the ASIE model-based CIDS platform to develop at least three instructional materials incorporating HOTS (Higher Order Thinking Skills) elements.
Through project deliverables, learners execute learning processes applying critical thinking and metacognitive strategies with over 80% participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
